{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = Cable/DSL Web Safe Router |caption2 = |pp = |sp = https://www.netgear.com/support/product/RP614v3 |dl = |wikidevi = Netgear_RP614v3 |wikipedia = |ddwrtsupport = |openwrtsupport = |tomatosupport = |gargoylesupport = |brand = Netgear |model = RP614 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = v3 |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = RP614 |type = router |sernum = |fcc_id = |icid = |us_id = |boardid = |ecc_id = |cpu1chip1 = Micrel;KS8695X;KS8695X, 0439B0, AMK4211130, 1568377; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM922T |cpu1_type_rev = ALTERA |cpu1spd = |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV800BBTC-90; |flash1size = 1 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 8 |ram1chip = ESMT;M12L64164A-7T; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 00:0F:B5 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = Nucleus RTOS;;; |exp_if_types = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, J2,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, looks like it,, J5 |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = none |defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = password |manuf = Delta Networks |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 10/2004 |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "2976233202" and a date code of ''0446'' is silkscreened on the board. :The caps on this board are all ''TAICON'' branded. A version string within ''Netgear'''s binary FW for this device :(which is valid for the RP614v2 as well..) :indicates this device is using the '''Nucleus PLUS''' kernel. The version string is '''~ (c) 1993-2002 AT - Nucleus PLUS - IDT32334 SDE-MIPS v. 1.13.2'''. ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== The pinout would appear to be the following.. 
(GND) (RxD) (TxD) [3.3] J2
====Boot log==== 
@_@! Post Code Start.....
SW_REV_2d02d00KKDebug(Menu): Normal check ok!!!
KKDebug(ISR_IrqHandler): Interrupt is 20000!!!
KKDebug(ISR_IrqHandler): Interrupt is 20000!!!
KKDebug(ISR_IrqHandler): Interrupt is 20000!!!
KKDebug(ISR_IrqHandler): Interrupt is 20000!!!
KKDebug(ISR_IrqHandler): Interrupt is 20000!!!
==Notes== ===Probable used PSU(s)=== The power supply bundled with the device looks to have :been an ''OEM'' AD-051A - ''Netgear'' P/N PWR-10028-01. {{hasPowerSupply |brand = OEM |model = AD-051A |revision = (Netgear PWR-10028-01) |countrymanuf = China |input_v=120 |input_a=0.11 |input_c=AC |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=5 |output_a=1 |output_conn=barrel |style=large, vertical }} [[Category:English Documentation]]
